summary: Qigong is an ancient Chinese practice that combines movement, breathing, and meditation. It is believed to help improve health, both physically and mentally. The word "qi" means life energy, and "gong" means skill, so Qigong teaches you to control and balance this energy. People do Qigong to relax, exercise, and even improve their martial arts skills. It's like a peaceful workout for your body and mind, helping you feel calm and healthy.
title: Qigong
